manipulations.insert_object: Add a large golden statue of a dog on the shelf to the left, ensuring it casts a shadow consistent with the lighting.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the bowl from the right bookshelf to create an empty space, keeping the lighting consistent.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background behind the group with a photorealistic image of a tropical beach, maintaining realistic depth of field.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the tan coat of the man in the middle to be made of bright red velvet, keeping the original folds and shadows.
manipulations.reflection_shadow_edit: Add a clear reflection of the group on the floor, matching the angle and making it appear wet.
